H0.text: what is the capital of modern day egypt. Alexandria

H1.text: what is the capital of modern day egypt. Giza

H2.text: what is the capital of modern day egypt. Luxor

H3.text: what is the capital of modern day egypt. Cairo

A4.text: Cairo is the capital and largest city of Egypt and the Cairo Governorate, being home to more than 10 million people.

A5.text: The area that would become Cairo was part of ancient Egypt, as the Giza pyramid complex and the ancient cities of Memphis and Heliopolis are near-by.
